name: Fishing Break - Addictive Fishing Game
description:
Fishing Break is an addictive fishing game. You can explore different sea world to catch all kinds of fish. Try you best to improve your fishing skills to get more rare fish!

Features:
- Simple game operation, endless game fun.
- More than 50 species of rare fish are waiting for you to collect.
- Five mystery sea worlds to explore.
- Upgrade your fishing skills to become a fishing master.
- Free to play.

If you like this game please share it with your friends and families.

Enjoy and feel free to contact us via,
- Email: larkzhang29@gmail.com
